rows.label: qst100502_msg0002
rows.name: You see, mo?

rows.label: qst100502_msg0003
rows.name: ...A test, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0004
rows.name:
Those without knowledge
can go home, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0005
rows.name: ...Read, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0101
rows.name: ...Come back later, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0110
rows.name: You came again, mo?

rows.label: qst100502_msg0111
rows.name: ...A test, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0201
rows.name: You pass, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0202
rows.name: Don't get excited over this, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0203
rows.name: Now then, assistant.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0204
rows.name: ...I just appointed you, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0205
rows.name: Your mission, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0206
rows.name:
Open the door on the top floor
and investigate inside, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0207
rows.name: No one in Avaritia could open it...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0208
rows.name: We don't know, so we open it, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0209
rows.name: Our origin...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0210
rows.name: Hehe...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0211
rows.name: However, there is no key, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0212
rows.name: Location unknown, mo. Find it, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0213
rows.name: I'm counting on you, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0301
rows.name:
Open the door on the top floor
and investigate inside, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0302
rows.name:
The key's location is
unknown, mo. Find it, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0401
rows.name: Assistant, report, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0402
rows.name:
The assistant's mission is also
to investigate inside the door.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0403
rows.name: Proceed, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0501
rows.name: Assistant, report, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0502
rows.name:
A Nopon statue with an
eyepatch... and a strange hat...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0503
rows.name: Captain Nopopon...!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0504
rows.name:
The statue of the legendary pirate
Nopon, Captain Nopopon, mo!!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0521
rows.name:
To think there was a trace of the
Captain here! Hooray, hooray, mo!!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0522
rows.name: ...Ahem. I got carried away, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0523
rows.name:
And the indentations on the
stomach... A circle, and a square...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0524
rows.name:
We probably need two types of parts
to fit into the indentations, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0525
rows.name: Find them and fit them in, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0601
rows.name:
Find the round and square
parts and fit them into
the indentations, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0602
rows.name:
The two parts' locations are
unknown, mo. Find them, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0701
rows.name: Assistant, report, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0702
rows.name:
The assistant's mission is also to
fit the two parts into the statue.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0703
rows.name: Proceed, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0801
rows.name: Assistant, report, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0802
rows.name: Coordinates... Hr√¶svelgr...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0803
rows.name: Investigate, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0804
rows.name: Hehe... We're getting closer, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0901
rows.name: Assistant, report, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0902
rows.name:
Sparkling treasure... Captain
Nopopon's journal...

rows.label: qst100502_msg0903
rows.name:
You can have the sparkling things,
mo. Show me the journal, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0904
rows.name: Homf homf... Mmmm...?!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0905
rows.name: This is... MOMOMOMOMOMOMOMO!!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0906
rows.name:
This journal... it's a mix of ancient
and modern Nopon writing, mo!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0907
rows.name:
If I can decipher this... I'll
be able to read the ancient Nopon
written on the statue, mo~!

rows.label: qst100502_msg0908
rows.name: ...Ahem. I got a bit too excited, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0909
rows.name:
Investigate the statue, mo.
Assistant, come too, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg0910
rows.name:
W-wait for me, mo~! Hurry
up and come, mo~!!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1001
rows.name: I've deciphered it, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1002
rows.name:
This statue was made by the
ancient Nopon tribe in praise
of Captain Nopopon, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1003
rows.name:
By deciphering the statue and
Captain Nopopon's journal...

rows.label: qst100502_msg1004
rows.name:
I've discovered a shocking
truth that will go down
in Nopon history, mo~!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1005
rows.name:
It turns out... the ancient
Nopon tribe didn't use 'mo'!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1006
rows.name:
When I deciphered the ancient
Nopon writing, none of the
sentences had 'mo'!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1007
rows.name: And... that's not all, mo...

rows.label: qst100502_msg1008
rows.name:
Captain Nopopon's journal
says this, mo...

rows.label: qst100502_msg1009
rows.name:
'I have grown tired of fighting
to obtain treasure... So I
came up with an idea.'

rows.label: qst100502_msg1010
rows.name:
'The appearance of Nopon
can make them seem "cute"
to those of other lands.'

rows.label: qst100502_msg1011
rows.name:
'Using this cuteness, which is perfect for
smooth exchanges with other countries, I
want to create a new Nopon era, mo.'

rows.label: qst100502_msg1012
rows.name:
'Furthermore, in my long years of negotiation,
I've found that adding the sound "mo" to the end
of sentences makes us seem even cuter, mo!'

rows.label: qst100502_msg1013
rows.name:
'Nopopon will use the cuteness
of being fluffy and this new
way of speaking...'

rows.label: qst100502_msg1014
rows.name:
'...to make the brand-new
Nopon Guild big, mo~ I'll
do my best, momomo~!'

rows.label: qst100502_msg1015
rows.name: ...That is all, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1016
rows.name:
That's right! The pirate Captain
Nopopon was the founder of modern
Nopon language, who started using 'mo'~!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1017
rows.name:
...Ahem. This discovery
is a stroke of luck, mo.

rows.label: qst100502_msg1018
rows.name: Assistant... Th-thank you, mo~~!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1019
rows.name:
This is an amazing discovery that
will rewrite Nopon history, mo~!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1020
rows.name:
Just as Captain Nopopon said,
Nopon have to be cute, mo!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1021
rows.name:
The mystery of the door is
solved, so I'll stop trying
to be cool and silent, mo~!

rows.label: qst100502_msg1022
rows.name: Whoopee! I'll go tell everyone, mo~!
